sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { useLanguage } from '../context/LanguageContext'; const About = () => { const { t } = useLanguage(); return (
{/* Hero Section */}

{t('aboutSubtitle')}

{/* Founders Section */}

{t('foundersTitle')}

{/* Mete Avcı */}

{t('meteName')}

{t('meteRole')}

{t('meteBio')}

{t('meteTag1')} {t('meteTag2')} {t('meteTag3')}
{/* Doğa Aydın */}

{t('dogaName')}

{t('dogaRole')}

{t('dogaBio')}

{t('dogaTag1')} {t('dogaTag2')} {t('dogaTag3')}
{/* Our Doctrine Section */}

{t('doctrineTitle')}

{t('doctrineSubtitle')}

{/* Principle 1 */}

{t('principle1Title')}

{t('principle1Bio')}

{/* Principle 2 */}

{t('principle2Title')}

{t('principle2Bio')}

{/* Principle 3 */}

{t('principle3Title')}

{t('principle3Bio')}

); }; export default About;
